events.message: Customer reported a severe car collision that occurred on a busy intersection causing substantial damage to the vehicle's front end.
The claim has been reviewed and properly classified under the Auto Accident cluster as per the reported incident details.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and support the customer through the process.
Customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and to inform them about the next steps.
The customer was asked to submit the police report, vehicle damage photos, and repair estimates for further processing.
All requested documents including police report and photos showing the extent of vehicle damage were received from the customer.
Claims investigation commenced to verify the details of the accident and evaluate liability and damages.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of the accident details and verification of the damage costs.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering car repairs and related expenses.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim.
The insurance claim was formally approved based on the investigation results and agreement on settlement value.
Settlement payment was processed and issued to the customer's nominated bank account as agreed.
The claim file has been closed after successful settlement and payment, with no pending actions remaining.
All claim records and documents have been archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
